verses.verse: And <S%H4813>Miriam<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> against <S%H4872>Moses<s%> because <S%H182>of<s%> the <S%H3571>Ethiopian<s%> <S%H802>woman<s%> whom he had <S%H3947>married<s%>: for he had <S%H3947>married<s%> an <S%H3571>Ethiopian<s%> <S%H802>woman<s%>. Ethiopian: or, Cushite married: Heb. taken

And they <S%H559>said<s%>, Hath the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> indeed <S%H1696>spoken<s%> only by <S%H4872>Moses<s%>? hath he not <S%H1696>spoken<s%> also by us? And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> it.
(Now the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> was <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H6035>meek<s%> <S%H6035><s%>, above all the <S%H120>men<s%> which were upon the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H127>earth<s%>.)

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>spake<s%> <S%H6597>suddenly<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, and unto <S%H175>Aaron<s%>, and unto <S%H4813>Miriam<s%>, Come <S%H3318>out<s%> ye <S%H7969>three<s%> unto the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%>. And they <S%H7969>three<s%> came <S%H3318>out<s%>.

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> came <S%H3381>down<s%> in the <S%H5982>pillar<s%> of the <S%H6051>cloud<s%>, and <S%H5975>stood<s%> in the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%>, and <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and <S%H4813>Miriam<s%>: and they <S%H8147>both<s%> came <S%H3318>forth<s%>.

And he <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H8085>Hear<s%> now my <S%H1697>words<s%>: If there be a <S%H5030>prophet<s%> among you, I the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will make myself <S%H3045>known<s%> unto him in a <S%H4759>vision<s%>, and will <S%H1696>speak<s%> unto him in a <S%H2472>dream<s%>.
My <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> is not so, who is <S%H539>faithful<s%> in all mine <S%H1004>house<s%>.

With him will I <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H6310>mouth<s%> to <S%H6310>mouth<s%>, even <S%H4758>apparently<s%>, and not in dark <S%H2420>speeches<s%>; and the <S%H8544>similitude<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall he <S%H5027>behold<s%>: wherefore then were ye not <S%H3372>afraid<s%> to <S%H1696>speak<s%> against my <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%>?
And the <S%H639>anger<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> was <S%H2734>kindled<s%> against them; and he <S%H3212>departed<s%>.

And the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> <S%H5493>departed<s%> from off the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%>; and, behold, <S%H4813>Miriam<s%> became <S%H6879>leprous<s%>, white as <S%H7950>snow<s%>: and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H6437>looked<s%> upon <S%H4813>Miriam<s%>, and, behold, she was <S%H6879>leprous<s%>.

And <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H994>Alas<s%>, my <S%H113>lord<s%>, I beseech thee, <S%H7896>lay<s%> not the <S%H2403>sin<s%> upon us, wherein we have done <S%H2973>foolishly<s%>, and wherein we have <S%H2398>sinned<s%>.

Let her not be as one <S%H4994>dead<s%> <S%H4191><s%>, of whom the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> is <S%H2677>half<s%> <S%H398>consumed<s%> when he cometh <S%H3318>out<s%> of his <S%H517>mother's<s%> <S%H7358>womb<s%>.
And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6817>cried<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H7495>Heal<s%> her now, O <S%H410>God<s%>, I beseech thee.

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, If her <S%H1>father<s%> had <S%H3417>but<s%> <S%H3417>spit<s%> in her <S%H6440>face<s%>, should she not be <S%H3637>ashamed<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>? let her be <S%H5462>shut<s%> <S%H2351>out<s%> from the <S%H4264>camp<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>, and <S%H310>after<s%> that let her be <S%H622>received<s%> in again.

And <S%H4813>Miriam<s%> was <S%H5462>shut<s%> <S%H2351>out<s%> from the <S%H4264>camp<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>: and the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5265>journeyed<s%> not till <S%H4813>Miriam<s%> was <S%H622>brought<s%> in again.
And <S%H310>afterward<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5265>removed<s%> from <S%H2698>Hazeroth<s%>, and <S%H2583>pitched<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H6290>Paran<s%>.
